title: Dinosaurs: the age of the terrible lizard
brief_description: An animated film which presents an overview of the dinosaur age, showing the major types of dinasaurs and some of their behavioural characteristics. Gives evidence of evolutionary development and indicates a possible reason for their becoming extinct. Edited version of film “Dinozaury”.
